attributes.action: Conduct and publish an independent review into race relations with the Police
attributes.additional_details: Due to events in recent weeks, months, and years, we would like a review/inquiry to be conducted so that the authorities are able to find the shortcomings that can be seen to have occurred in several incidences where people can easily be seen to have been treated differently due to their creed or skin colour. We believe that this would allow measures to be put into place to prevent future incidents from occurring and being a major stepping stone to creating a fairer, more equal society for all.
attributes.background: We would like the Home Office and other related departments to conduct an independent review and/or inquiry into the relationships of all of the creeds and races with the Police and publish the findings so that it is available to the wider public along with possible solutions to issues arising.
